title: The Best
text: Excellent!!!This place has authentic italian food. The service is top notch, everything is fresh. I would eat here every week if I lived here. They are great with food allergies or Celiac Disease( gluten free).

title: I would go again
text: The food here is excellent. If you talk to the waitress about gluten free or food allergies, they are very helpful. It is really nice sitting outside.

title: Dinner
text: Their food is good. They have a large selection, service was ok. The bartender is not that good. If you are GF make sure you test your food. Some of the gluten free food did not come out GF

title: Too many other good restraunts to go here again.
text: Took 15 min to get seated. And noone was in lone. Took 15 min to get coffee after we order our food. 20 minutes from the time we ordered the coffee. I didn't get what I ordered, my husband asked for more dressing and never got it. The waitress came back to see if everything was ok and walked away before I could say anything.

title: Gluten free
text: Love this place. I f you have celiacs or have milk allergies this is the place to go. Food is great! Amazing GF pancakes. Brazilan coffe is great.

title: Not bad
text: It is in a quiet location. It is not 5 star, but it was ok for the area.Was a good price for the area and time of year. Not a lot of options in this area. Would stay there again. You can uber around this area from here.

title: Warrington need this
text: Love this restraunt. This area is lacking in good restaurants. They don't have your stanard menu. It is nice to see something differant for a change. Food is great and service is even better. They can do gluten free here. Just ask.

title: Worth the stop
text: This museum is out of the way, and does not look like much from the outside, but it is worth the stop. Unlike most museums, they let you get close to the artifacts. Very nice place. Small but lots of interesting things to see.

title: Put everything in the Safe
text:
I had all my jewelry stolen. I did not put it in the safe, big mistake.
Other than that, this hotel is in a bad part of the city. All the taxi drivers said it was not safe to walk around. There are signs up all around the businesses near by telling you that it is a high crime area. The buffet was not that good. They have no gluten free.
The music at a bar across the street blares all night till 4AM. If you want to party across the street this is the place for you. The bartender is very nice. The place is fairly clean. I would not stay there again. Far from all sight seeing. Close to subway.

title: Breakfast
text: The food was excellent. They could accommodate Celiac and dairy allergy. The wait staff was excellent as well as the manager. They were so attentive and concerned if we enjoyed everything. Most restraunts don't care or go the extra mile that this one does.

title: Romantic
text: The food was excellent. They could accommodate my food allergies and my celiac disease. I was able to eat what I wanted rather than be told what I could have. Service was great.

title: Covered
text: We were disappointed, it was covered. We couldn't even tell if it was Big Ben. Slightly sad, they should let you know somehow.

title: At night
text: It was worth going to see. It is a little cold at night in the winter. Go during the day. Take lots of pictures.

title: London
text: Great hotel. Worth every penny. Great area. Will stay there next time we are in town. Rooms are clean and bedding is very comfortable. Great hot water. Staff is excellent and very helpful. They even have American outlet in room.

title: Gluten free icecream
text: We stopped at over 2 dozen ice cream stores and they all use gluten This one has without. Great service.

title: Day on Island
text: Great food, try the seafood, it is very fresh. Nice service. They have gluten free pasta. Takes extra 30 min. They speak english.

title: Very nice
text: They can do gluten free. They understand what celiac is. They also speak english. Fod was amazing and well priced.

title: Beautiful
text: It worth going. We went in winter so there were no lines. Beware when the sun goes down the temperature drops fast.

title: No Gluten free
text: I agree, they are very rude. Everything looks amazing. But when we adked if they had any gluten free, they were not very nice. The place is in a high crime area. Signs posted everywhere. The place is not the cleanest either.

title: Amazing
text: The food is excellent here. They go out of there way to make sure you enjoy your meal. If you have any food allergies, all you have to is tell them or ask and they will make what ever you want, even if it is not on the menu. As long as they have the ingredients.

title: Not great
text:
The food was ok, nothing special. Not many choices other than fried.
Service was horrible. Don't go of you are starving, you'll be dead before the food comes out.

title: Not clean
text: I was not impressed. We arrived at 1:30 am and the first room they gave us had very dirty sheets. The second room was missing sheets. We went down and got sheets from front desk and made our own bed. They did not seem like it was a big deal. Then when we went to get a shower there was a dirty wash cloth left in the shower. The bathroom floor was not clean either.
place: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charlottesville - Ruckersville

title: Gluten free
text: This is a great place to go if you have celiac, food allergies or if you are paleo. The food is amazing. Everyone pays special attention to details.

title: Nice evening
text: We went on a Saturday night. Service was fairly fast. Food was good. Their menu was not very gluten free friendly. If you want a vegan or gluten free meal, this probably not the place to go. Wine selections are very poor as well.

title: Lunch
text: Food was very good. I great place to eat if you are gluten free or Paleo. Our server was very nice and patient as well. She was very knowledgeable about the menu, and was able to answer the many questions we had.
place: Harvest Seasonal Grill & Wine Bar – Glen Mills

title: Convention
text: I love seeing the fountains. The lights and music are amazing.A most due if you are in Vegas. Stay in a room with a view of them if you can.

title: Enjoyed
text: The food was excellent, we had the bronzino and mushroom ravioli. The captain was very good, he guided to great choices on food and wine. We will be back.
place: Il Mulino New York - Las Vegas

title: Drinks
text: We sat at the bar. The bartender was great. Pleasant atmosphere, great company at the bar. The local people were very nice. The food here was amazing, try the key lime pie if you go here.

title: Plane broke down
text: The staff is very pleasant. It is a very clean hotel. Bedding is very nice and comfortable. The bathrooms are updated. Very quaint hotel. It is close to everything. You can walk a very short distance and find something.

title: Not tops
text: Let me start with the food was good, but for a very high priced restraunt it did not do very well. It took 20 minutes to get our first drinks after we arrived. The appetizers only took 15 minutes, and they were good, nothing exceptional. The entrees took over an hour, and noone ever came out to apologize for the extreme wait. My son had to go to the bar twice to get drinks for our table, because we were not checked on properly. And it was so loud and noisy in the restaurant that it was impossible to have a conversation. They need sound proofing desperately. For such a highend place, they failed to meet expectations.

title: Hottest day ever
text: I took the kids and they loved it. They did not want to leave. I think it took a lot of time and effort to build this place. It was 108 degrees out when went went, and they still had a blast. The bathrooms are a little far away, so stop there first, so that you do not have to spend a lot of time walking.

title: Bar
text: Try the pork wings, they are excellent. A lot of gluten free options. Bartenders are very nice, and great with drinks. The outside bar area is not to loud.

title: Wine bar
text: Octopus, ravioli and cheese board was excellent. Bartender was very nice and friendly. We will definitely go again

title: Drinks
text: Very quaint little place. We only had drinks here, but bartender was especially nice and attentive. Worth stopping in.

title: Great expresso
text: We had expresso and gluten free flourless cake and it was excellent! Cashier was very friendly and helpful.

title: Weekend
text: They did a great job with it. Definitely worth the money and a must see if if NYC. We did priority tickets was worth not waiting in line.

title: Weekend
text: Amazing view. They did a very good job putting together thos memorial. Worth paying priorty to skip the long lines.

title: Dinner
text: We sat at the bar and ate. Bartender Molly was very nice. Chef was excellent and came out to check on us. Food was perfect. I get my steak Pittsburgh rare, which not everyone can do correct, but was done perfect.

title: Quaint
text: Food was very good, and so was the service. We ate outside, very quaint lttle place if you do not want touristy.

title: Dinner
text: This is an ok restraunt. Do not get the zucchini. Was cold and did not taste good. Prices were good. But food was sub par for Italy.

title: Bocelli
text: It was an amazing day. We had so much fun. We went to the Officine Bocelli and had a 4 course meal that was 5 stars. Then we went to see the Theater of Silence were Bocelli has a concert once a year. It was so beautiful there. After that we got to see the winery and the vineyard. We will be back to see the concert in July with Great Italy Tour!!! Maurizio Lucci and the staff are absolute perfection!!!

title: Get what you pay for
text: Rooms smell like smoke even though it is a non smoking hotel. Even the elevator smelled like smoke. Cigarette burns in furniture and linens. The towels had someone else's hair on them. No HBO. Beds are ok. I didn't want to try the free breakfast.

title: Amazing!!
text: The food here is always excellent. Very few places know how to cook a steak Pittsburgh rare correctly, but Bobby Flay did it perfect. I can not eat gluten and I find that I never leave here feeling hungry or that I missed out on something. Service was wonderful as well.

title: Not so great
text: Very high priced for quality of food. We had the steak that was a special and pasta.The steak at Texas Road house is 10 tumes better. It came out wrong temperature and it was like a piece of leather. The pasta came out in a soup bowl. And it had way to much sauce on it. The meal left an after taste of eating in the hospital. They forgot to bring our wine out with the meal as well. I would not recommend this restaurant. There are some really good restaurants in AC that are same price point.

title: Great food
text: We eat here all the time and the food never disappoints us. Family style restraunt. Not great for 2 people.

title: Holiday getaway
text:
I give it 2 stars only because the staff was super nice, and the place was very clean. But the stay was horrible. We were told we were getting a junior suite with a plunge pool on the phone, $1100.00 per night. Instead they just gave us a room with a view. When we said something to them about it, they said they would get back to us but never did. Then we had New Years Dinner for $140.00 and the meal was not any better than the regular meals. We both ended up violently ill 2 hours after we ate, so we missed New Year’s Eve and lost a day being sick. We went to the seminar for becoming members, so we could get the free romantic meal, and it was a sham. They tell you one thing and then when they draw up the contract they tell you all the things it does not include, all the times you cannot use it and all the extra charges that they get ever year. It was a waist of the entire day. They tell you it only takes 90 minutes, but they kept us for 6 1/2 hours. We did not get to do anything that day, and we were only there for 3 days. I recommended skipping it you do stay here, it is not worth your time. The meals are all so similar that is does not matter which restaurant you choose. Breakfast and Lunch at the buffet everyday was the same. Then at the end they tried to charge us for wine we didn't have and for things we did not do. Arguing about this for an hour while they checked into it made us late for the airport and we almost missed our flight. We tried checking out earlier so that wouldn't be late leaving for our flight and they would not let us. Night life is a bust. There is no one out after 9pm, very boring!
We would not stay at this location again, we have had better times at less expensive locations.

title: Holiday
text: We only were at this hotel one night during our stay in Costa Rica, but I wish we would have stayed here the entire trip. The hot Springs are amazing. the view is incredible.The spa is great as well. And everyone there was so friendly and nice. Rooms do need a little updating, but we will definitely be returning here.
place: Baldi Hot Springs Hotel Resort & Spa
placeLocation: La Fortuna de San Carlos, Costa Rica

title: Horrible Service
text:
We stayed at this hotel several times and each one was a bad experience.
We found bugs in the bathroom.
We could hear the people in the room next to us.
They lost our reservation.
Assistant manager was very poor in handling any of the situations.
